raw: ZoomInfo Moves Ahead with Rare Crisis-Era U.S. Tech IPO .
replaced: DiscoverOrg Moves Ahead with the IPO .

raw: ( Bloomberg ) --
replaced: ( Bloomberg ) --

raw: ZoomInfo Technologies Inc. , a business - intelligence platform owned by private equity firms , plans to go public as early as June in what could be one of the first technology listings since the start of the coronavirus pandemic , according to people with knowledge of the matter .
replaced: DiscoverOrg  The plans to go public as early as June in what could be one of the first technology listings since the start of the pandemic , according to people with knowledge of the matter .

raw: The Vancouver , Washington - based company may launch a virtual roadshow to market its stock as soon as this month , said the people , who asked not to be identified because the information is private .
replaced: DiscoverOrg may launch a virtual roadshow to market DiscoverOrg  its stock as soon as this month , said people with knowledge of the matter .

raw: ZoomInfo on Monday updated its filing for an initial public offering with its latest financial information .
replaced: DiscoverOrg on Monday updated DiscoverOrg  the filing  an initial public offering with its latest financial information  DiscoverOrg latest financial information .

raw: Following its February 2019 deal to combine with DiscoverOrg , the company ’s revenue almost doubled to $ 102 million in the first quarter compared with the same period last year , according to the filing .
replaced: Following DiscoverOrg February 2019 deal to combine with DiscoverOrg , DiscoverOrg  DiscoverOrg ’s revenue almost doubled to $ 102 million in the first quarter compared with the same month last year  last year , according to the filing .

raw: Meanwhile , its net loss for the quarter shrunk to $ 5.9 million from $ 40 million in 2019 .
replaced: Meanwhile , DiscoverOrg net loss for the first quarter shrunk to $ 5.9 million from $ 40 million in 2019 .

raw: The company also said in the filing that in April , the annualized value of its contracts grew 87 % compared with the same month last year .
replaced: DiscoverOrg also said in the filing that in April , the annualized value of DiscoverOrg contracts grew 87 % compared with the same month last year  last year .

raw: No decision is final and ZoomInfo ’s IPO plans could still change .
replaced: No decision is final and DiscoverOrg ’s IPO plans could still change .

raw: A representative for ZoomInfo declined to comment .
replaced: A representative for DiscoverOrg declined to comment .

raw: The plans come after Kingsoft Cloud Holdings Ltd. , the third - biggest cloud service provider in China by revenue , jumped 40 % in its U.S. trading debut after raising $ 510 million last week .
replaced: The plans come after Kingsoft jumped 40 % in Kingsoft U.S. trading debut after raising $ 510 million last year .

raw: Kingsoft was the first major listing in the U.S. since mid - March , when the Covid-19 outbreak was declared a pandemic and trading volatility skyrocketed .
replaced: Kingsoft was the first major listing in the U.S. since mid - March , when the Covid-19 outbreak was declared a pandemic and trading volatility skyrocketed .

raw: A technology IPO would be a positive sign in an otherwise dreary market for offerings .
replaced: A technology IPO would be a positive sign in an otherwise dreary market for offerings .

raw: Companies that were planning to go public this year , such as Airbnb Inc. and Procore Technologies Inc. , have instead turned to private funding .
replaced: Companies that were planning to go public this year , such as Airbnb Inc. and Procore Technologies Inc. , have instead turned to private funding .

raw: ZoomInfo listed the size of its planned offering as $ 500 million in a filing in February , a placeholder figure that will likely change .
replaced: DiscoverOrg listed the size of DiscoverOrg  an initial public offering with its latest financial information as $ 500 million in a filing in February , a placeholder figure that will likely change .

raw: Raising $ 500 million would make ZoomInfo ’s IPO the second - biggest in the U.S. since the pandemic began , according to data compiled by Bloomberg .
replaced: Raising $ 500 million would make DiscoverOrg ’s IPO the second - biggest in the U.S. since the pandemic began , according to data compiled by Bloomberg .

raw: If the IPO is successful , ZoomInfo will have to make sure traders can tell it apart from several other companies with similar names , including Zoom Video Communications Inc. , the video - conferencing system that ’s become a work - from - home staple for many during the coronavirus crisis .
replaced: If the IPO is successful , DiscoverOrg will have to make sure traders can tell DiscoverOrg apart from several other companies with similar names , including Zoom Video Communications Inc. , the video - conferencing system that ’s become a work - from - home staple for many during the coronavirus crisis .

raw: That company ’s shares are up 140 % this year , valuing it at about $ 46 billion just over a year after its own IPO .
replaced: DiscoverOrg ’s shares are up 140 % this year , valuing DiscoverOrg at about $ 46 billion just over a year after DiscoverOrg  the IPO .

raw: Mobile hardware manufacturer Zoom Technologies Inc. changed its ticker to ZTNO from ZOOM to avoid confusion , after its stock rallied 890 % in the first quarter and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission suspended its trading .
